channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Google ad change could affect millions of small businesses
item.description: Google is changing the way its Google Local Services ads work, which could affect millions of small businesses.

item.title: American consumers feeling much more confident as Election Day nears
item.description: American consumers are feeling quite a bit more confident this month as Election Day approaches, a business research group says.

item.title: ‘All I can think about is hotter days.’ Voter campaigns target Latinas worried about climate change
item.description: As the November election approaches, large get-out-the-vote efforts are targeting Latinos, and particularly Latina moms, with a climate focus.
